title: NA offers Fateha for Senator Taj Haider
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP):The National Assembly on Wednesday offered Fateha for the departed soul of Cenetral Secretary General of Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) Senator Taj Haider.
On the request of Deputy Speaker Ghulam Mustafa Shah, Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) lawmaker Major Â® Tahir Iqbal led the Fateha.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with equanimity.
